org.fluidity.composition

Interface ComponentDiscovery


  • public interface ComponentDiscovery
    Partially implements the service provider discovery mechanism described in the JAR File Specification. The implementation is partial because this component does not instantiate the service provider classes, it only finds them.

    The goal of this component is to find and return the list of classes that implement a given interface or extend a given class. To find and instantiate those classes, use a dependency injected @ComponentGroup annotated array parameter instead.

    Usage

     @Component
 public final class MyComponent {

   MyComponent(final ComponentDiscovery discovery) {
     final ClassLoader loader = getClass().getClassLoader();
     final Class<MyProvider>[] classes = discovery.findComponentClasses(MyProvider.class, loader, false);
     assert classes != null : MyProvider.class;
     …
   }

   @ServiceProvider
   public interface MyProvider {
     …
   }
 }

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T> Class<? extends T>[] findComponentClasses(Class<T> api, ClassLoader classLoader, boolean strict)
      Finds all classes visible to the given class loader that implement or extend the given service provider interface.
      <T> Class<? extends T>[] findComponentClasses(String type, Class<T> api, ClassLoader classLoader, boolean inherit, boolean strict)
      Finds all classes visible to the given class loader that implement or extend the given service provider interface.

    • Method Detail

      • findComponentClasses

        <T> Class<? extends T>[] findComponentClasses(Class<T> api,
                                              ClassLoader classLoader,
                                              boolean strict)
        Finds all classes visible to the given class loader that implement or extend the given service provider interface. Use this method to find classes for standard JAR service providers or those with a corresponding @ServiceProvider annotation.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the given service provider interface.
        Parameters:
        api - the interface or class all discovered classes should implement or extend.
        classLoader - the class loader to use to find the classes.
        strict - specifies whether to find classes directly visible to the given class loader (true) or indirectly via any of its parent class loaders (false).
        Returns:
        a list of Class objects for the discovered classes.

      • findComponentClasses

        <T> Class<? extends T>[] findComponentClasses(String type,
                                              Class<T> api,
                                              ClassLoader classLoader,
                                              boolean inherit,
                                              boolean strict)
        Finds all classes visible to the given class loader that implement or extend the given service provider interface. This variant can be used when the service provider list has been generated without a corresponding @ServiceProvider annotation.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the given service provider interface.
        Parameters:
        type - the type of the service provider.
        api - the interface or class all discovered classes should implement or extend.
        classLoader - the class loader to use to find the classes.
        inherit - specifies whether the discovered classes must be assignable to api (true) or not (false); checked only when type is not ServiceProviders.TYPE.
        strict - specifies whether to find classes directly visible to the given class loader (true) or indirectly via any of its parent class loaders (false).
        Returns:
        a list of Class objects for the discovered classes.
